title: If tagged "phishing", advise customer about phishing threat

value:
Hi {{ticket.assignee.first_name}},
This email we received is a phishing a threat. Please take action to report the phishing site to Google. 

For more information on what action to take, visit this help article:
https://support.itsolver.net/hc/en-au/articles/360000032595-Prevent-report-phishing-attacks

Concerned about security? Contact IT Solver to report or ask about a security issue.

{% if ticket.cc_names != empty %}There are multiple people included in this request. Replies to this email are sent to the following:
{% capture ccedusers %}{{ ticket.requester.name | append: ' '}} {{ticket.requester.email | prepend:'<' | append: '>, ' }}{% for cc in ticket.ccs %}{% unless forloop.last %}{{ cc.name append: ' '}} {{ cc.email | prepend:'<' | append: '>, ' }}{% else %}{{ cc.name | append: ' '}} {{ cc.email | prepend:'<' | append: '>' }}{% endunless %}{% endfor %}{% endcapture %}{{ ccedusers | strip_newlines | replace:'&quot','"' | replace:'&lt','<' | replace:'&gt','>' | replace:';','' }} and {% capture assigneeemail %}{{ticket.assignee.name}} <support@itsolver.net>{% endcapture %}{{ assigneeemail | strip_newlines | replace:'&quot','"' | replace:'&lt','<' | replace:'&gt','>'}}{% endif %}
